subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Some day, maybe soon, Carlos Beltrán, a switch-hitter who entered the game batting .155 in June and .265 over all, expects to be a lethal hitter again.
snippet: Some day, maybe soon, Carlos Beltrán, a switch-hitter who entered the game batting .155 in June and .265 over all, expects to be a lethal hitter again.
